Header: SFHQ-Cen Troops Give Blood for Kandy Patients
Content: A group of more than 20 Army personnel of the 11 Division and the Signal Training School at Buwelikada of the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) voluntarily donated their blood to support a project, launched by the Welfare Association of the District Court in Kandy. The blood is to be used for patients receiving treatment at Kandy Teaching Hospital. Welfare Association of District Court Kandy in a letter to the 11 Division Headquarters sought the assistance of the Army for donation of blood since the organization has a high regard for members of the armed forces. The donation campaign took place on Thursday (15) at the Kandy District Court premises.
